title: Quorum sensing employs a dual regulatory mechanism to repress T3SS gene expression.
authors: Paul P, Podicheti R, Geyman LJ, Baker EN, Papenfort K, Rusch DB, van Kessel JC
abstract: The type III secretion system (T3SS) is a needle-like complex used by numerous bacterial pathogens in host infection to inject exotoxins into the host cell cytoplasm. The T3SS is a known virulence factor in the shrimp pathogen
